description:
GUI Application to work with engine assets, asset bundles, and serialized files.


Premium Edition
The corresponding premium release is here.What's Changed
- Translations update from Weblate by @Weblate-Samboy-Dev in #1387
- Validate array length for yaml byte arrays
- Resolve an issue with empty assembly names
- Fix GameObject components before 5.5
- Support new Unity versions
Full Changelog: https://github.com/AssetRipper/AssetRipper/compare/1.0.16...1.0.17
